SELECT A.ALLOC_ID, A.ALLOC_NM FROM BMS_ALLOC_OPER_MST A WHERE
AND (A.ALLOC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || A.ALLOC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%'))
AND A.ALLOC_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND A.ALLOC_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY A.ALLOC_ID

SELECT A.VHC_ID , A.VHC_NO , A.MAKER , A.MODEL_NM , MK.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM , A.VHC_FUEL , VF.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_FUEL_NM , B.COMP_NM FROM BMS_VHC_MST A LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO MK ON A.MAKER = MK.DL_CD AND MK.CO_CD = 'MAKER' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO VF ON A.VHC_FUEL = VF.DL_CD AND VF.CO_CD = 'VHC_FUEL' LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST B ON A.COMP_ID = B.COMP_ID

SELECT A.ALLOC_ID , A.VHC_ID , B.VHC_NO , B.MAKER , MK.DL_CD_NM AS MAKER_NM , B.MODEL_NM , B.VHC_FUEL , VF.DL_CD_NM AS VHC_FUEL_NM , C.COMP_NM FROM BMS_ALLOC_VHC_CMPSTN A LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST B ON A.VHC_ID = B.VHC_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO MK ON B.MAKER = MK.DL_CD AND MK.CO_CD = 'MAKER' LEFT JOIN BMS_DL_CD_INFO VF ON B.VHC_FUEL = VF.DL_CD AND VF.CO_CD = 'VHC_FUEL' LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST C ON B.COMP_ID = C.COMP_ID WHERE A.ALLOC_ID = #{ALLOC_ID}
